section.name: Current status
section.p: For now, focus has been on the table/column tags that are used to show data extracted from a List in a simple and consistant way.

section.name: What's New
section.p: Version 0.8.5 has been released (03/23/03). This release is primarily a bug-fixing release and also represents the first release from the project at SourceForge. If you would like to have a say in the future direction of this project, please join one of the mailing lists .
A complete changelog is available, and click here to download the latest source or standalone jar file.
